title: Alpha client not loading
body: does anyone else have access to alpha client but it never actually completes updating? How do I fix this?

replies.body:
Since the Alpha Client is... well, in Alpha, it's prone to crashes and issues. Since we're still testing it, we're only able to offer limited support for it. Patching issues can typically be resolved by working through our [patching issues guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

Let me know if you have any questions.
